title: Maritime Patrol Aircraft Management
description: A C2 operator must manage a fleet of maritime patrol aircraft (MPA) to maintain surveillance over a large ocean area.

tasks.description: Divide the large operational area into smaller patrol sectors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator creates an efficient patrol plan.

tasks.description: Assign available MPA to each sector, considering aircraft endurance and sensor capabilities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator creates an optimal assignment of aircraft to sectors.

tasks.description: Monitor the aircraft as they execute their patrols and adjust sectors as needed to respond to new intelligence or contacts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator dynamically manages the patrol fleet to maintain continuous surveillance.
